title: [3 YOE,Unemployed, sales internship, Ottawa]
text:
Avery Haddad | Kanata, ON | (613) 555-0198 | avery.haddad@email.com

EDUCATION
Maple Ridge Secondary School
Grade 12 Senior Student                                           Kanata, Ontario
Current Average: 92%                                       Expected Graduation: June 2026
Relevant Coursework: Advanced Functions, Economics, Business Leadership
Leadership & Activities: Varsity Tennis Team Captain, Varsity Football Team, Investment Club
President, DECA Ontario Competitor (FTDM)

WORK & LEADERSHIP EXPERIENCE
City of Ottawa, Carleton University & General Burns Tennis Club                        Ottawa, ON
Tennis Head Coach                                                             Summers 2024-2025
• Coached 30+ students per week across 3 facilities, ranging from beginners to competitive players
• Managed scheduling, court bookings, and equipment for multi-site program operations
• Design and implement individualized training curricula focused on technical skill development,
  match strategy, and competitive readiness
• Developed lesson plans for stroke mechanics, footwork, and match play fundamentals
• Conducted private lessons, group clinics, and summer camp programs
• Collaborate with facility directors to optimize program offerings and enhance participant
  experience

613AutoCare                                                                        Kanata, ON
Co-Founder & Operator                                                       May 2025 – October 2025
• Built car detailing business from zero to $10K+ monthly revenue in first summer
• Managed all operations: scheduling, inventory, customer acquisition, and finances
• Acquired 40+ recurring customers through door-to-door sales, advertising and referrals
• Handled all customer communications, bookings, and payment processing
• Maintained 5/5 star rating across Google reviews
• Provided post-service follow-up to ensure customer satisfaction and encourage repeat business

Investment Club                                                                  Maple Ridge Secondary School
President                                                          September 2025 - October 2025
• Lead 60+ member club focused on equity analysis, financial markets education, and macroeconomic
  discussion
• Organize weekly meetings featuring paper trading competitions and market analysis presentations

SKILLS, ACTIVITIES & INTERESTS
Languages: Fluent in English and Arabic; Conversational Proficiency in French
Certifications: TPA Tennis Instructor Certified, Red Cross First Aid & CPR Certified
Interests: Actively manage personal equity portfolio with focus on fundamental analysis and value
investing; follow capital markets, equity research, and competitive sports
